## Project: MastodonCleaner

A .NET terminal application to delete all Mastodon posts before a specified date for a given account.

### Usage
- Run the app and provide:
  - Mastodon instance URL
  - Username
  - API access token
  - Cutoff date (YYYY-MM-DD)
- The app will delete all posts before the given date.

### Status
- Project scaffolded and main logic implemented.
- See README.md for details.
